original_solution_mapping.L3: Brenda has 55 - 9 = <<55-9=46>>46 cards since Janet has 9 cards more than Brenda.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2521.
    Returns: the total number of cards they have in all.
    """
    # L1
    total_less_mara = 150 # Mara has 40 cards less than 150
    less_amount_mara = 40 # Mara has 40 cards less than 150
    mara_cards = total_less_mara - less_amount_mara

    # L2
    twice_factor = 2 # Mara has twice as many cards as Janet
    janet_cards = mara_cards / twice_factor

    # L3
    janet_more_than_brenda = 9 # Janet has 9 cards more than Brenda
    brenda_cards = janet_cards - janet_more_than_brenda

    # L4
    total_cards = mara_cards + janet_cards + brenda_cards

    # FA
    answer = total_cards
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Janet has {mara_cards}/{twice_factor} = <<{mara_cards}/{twice_factor}={janet_cards}>>{janet_cards} cards since Mara has twice as many as Janet.
Brenda has {janet_cards} - {janet_more_than_brenda} = <<{janet_cards}-{janet_more_than_brenda}={brenda_cards}>>{brenda_cards} cards since Janet has {janet_more_than_brenda} cards more than Brenda.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Janet has 110/2 = <<110/2=55>>55 cards since Mara has twice as many as Janet.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Brenda has 55 - 9 = <<55-9=46>>46 cards since Janet has 9 cards more than Brenda.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'twice_factor' (value: 2) was used instead of 'janet_cards' (value: 55.0).
